trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_00<tab>Mogmug is flitting about frantically looking for someone to do his bidding.
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_01<tab>Mogmug has asked the newest member of his fan club─you─to gather four sankchinni vines. Head north of Moghome and gather the vines.
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_02<tab>The sankchinnis fall easily. Gather their vines and return to Mogmug.
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_03<tab>Mogmug is pleased at your obedience, and plans to use the vines to make a harp that will charm the attendees of the harvest fête, further expanding his army of fans.
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_TODO_00<tab>Slay sankchinnis and collect their vines.
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_000<tab>...Oh! You've returned to bask in my alluring aura! One can never have too many devotees... Say, I have just the job for a fledgling fan, kupo!
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_001<tab>I require four vines from the sankchinnis that reside north of Moghome. An ardent admirer such as yourself surely will not deny me!
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_010<tab>I dare not soil my immaculately groomed coat. Bring me four sankchinni vines and I'll be ever so grateful!
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_020<tab>My steadfast serv─I mean <var 1A 02 /var>supporter<var 1A 01 /var> has returned! Did the sankchinnis prove to be any trouble, kupo?

TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_021<tab>Magnificent! Marvelous! Such beauteous vines <var 1A 02 /var>almost<var 1A 01 /var> make me green with envy. With these I'll make the most harmonious harp in Moghome, and moogles for malms around will be enraptured when I perform at the harvest fête. Come and lend your voice to the cheers of my fabulous fans, kupo!
